dataIdInfo.idAbs: Copies input points to the results geodatabase and creates a circular buffer around each well. Important: inputs should have a unique field prior to using the tool. You can change the default name for the ID field in config.py file. The buffer distance can also be changed in the config file.

tool.name: WellBuffers
tool.summary: Copies input points to the results geodatabase and creates a circular buffer around each well. Important: inputs should have a unique field prior to using the tool. You can change the default name for the ID field in config.py file. The buffer distance can also be changed in the config file.
